Text: PLEASE NOTE: There are only 4 episodes in the 1st series. I wouldn't hold out on you :p
Please seed for as long as possible. This show is totally hilarious, utterly obscure and harder to obtain than a pair of Emma Watson's Granny Panties. Share the wealth :p
You MIGHT also LIKE the FB Page "Sam Simmons' Problems" :)
BTW the 2nd episode is called "Bus Crush" and the 4th episode is called "The Cardboard Angel". They're both rather apt titles :)
